description: Try our easy to follow Caramilk Cheesecake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: No-bake cheesecake,Seafood free,Spring,No-bake desserts,Sesame free,Baking,Quick & easy dessert
name: Caramilk Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Philadelphia caramilk cream cheese spread, softened
Cadbury caramilk block (see Tip, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a 20cm round springform pan. Line base and side with baking paper, extending paper 1cm above the edge of pan.

Place biscuits in a food processor and process until they resemble fine breadcrumbs. Transfer biscuit crumbs to a bow, then add butter and stir to combine. Using back of a metal spoon, press mixture over base and three-quarters of the way up the side of pan to compact. Refrigerate to chill.
Meanwhile, place 1/4 cup boiling water in a small bowl and sprinkle over gelatine, stirring until dissolved. Set aside to cool.

Using an electric mixer, beat cream cheese, condensed milk and vanilla until smooth and combined. Beat in gelatine mixture until just combined. Pour mixture over biscuit base. Refrigerate for 3 hours or until set. Serve decorated with chocolate shards.
